org.morphus

Class MoScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.morphus.MoScreen

  • public class MoScreen
extends Object
    Morphus tablet screen control class, provides the methods for setting the display mode of the screen.

      • isSdkJB42OrAbove

        public static boolean isSdkJB42OrAbove()
        Checks if the device android sdk is greater than 17
        Returns:
        true if the device sdk is greater than 17, false if not

      • set3DModeParallel

        public static boolean set3DModeParallel(Context context, Display.TnMode mode)
        Convenience method to change the screen display mode for parallel rendering, you need to pass the current android context to this method
        Returns:
        true if the switch scuessful, false if not
        See Also:
        Context
        Display.setTnMode(org.morphus.stereo.Display.TnMode)

      • set3DModeParallel

        public static boolean set3DModeParallel(Context context, int mode)
        Convenience method to change the screen display mode for parallel rendering, you need to pass the current android context to this method, and mode only equal 0, 1, 2
        Returns:
        true if the switch scuessful, false if not
        See Also:
        Context

        Returns:
        true if the switch scuessful, false if not
